level.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to use a pesticide in a manner that is inconsistent with the labeling of the pesticide, or that is in violation of the restrictions imposed on the use of the pesticide by the EPA or the Mayor.

No person shall make a pesticide recommendation that is inconsistent with the labeling of the pesticide, or that is in violation of the restrictions imposed on the use of the pesticide by the EPA or the Mayor.
It shall be unlawful for any person to falsify, or refuse or neglect to maintain or make available records required to be kept under the pesticide provisions of this title.
It shall be unlawful for any person to use fraud or misrepresentation in applying for certification or for a license.
It shall be unlawful for any person to refuse or neglect to comply with any limitations or restrictions on his or her certification or license.
It shall be unlawful for any person to make false or fraudulent claims through any media that misrepresent the effect of a pesticide or the method to be utilized in the application of a pesticide.
No person shall apply any known ineffective or improper pesticide, or operate faulty or unsafe equipment.
It shall be unlawful for any person to use or supervise the use of a pesticide in a faulty, careless, or negligent manner.
It shall be unlawful for any person to make false or fraudulent records, invoices, or reports.
It shall be unlawful for any person to aid, abet, or conspire with any other person to evade the pesticide provisions of this title.
It shall be unlawful for any person to make fraudulent or misleading statements during or after an inspection of a pest infestation.
No person shall impersonate any federal, state, or District inspector or official.
2207.13 It shall be unlawful for any person to distribute any pesticide that is adulterated.
It shall be unlawful for any person to fail to register a pesticide in accordance with the pesticide provisions of this title.
It shall be unlawful for any person to violate any other pesticide provision of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 18 of the Pesticide Operations Act of 1977, D.C. Law 2-70, 24 DCR 6867, 6895 (February 19, 1978).
